title: Files Scanned
body: So I'm currently installing League and How many files should be scanned? It's taking forever. Please help me up. Thanks alot!

replies.body: Rineyy speaks truth!  Depending on your specific computer, it can take some time for files to scan as well as update.  It's important to keep the scan running, as restarting it can start the process all over again.
It can scan thousands depending on how many files are damaged or corrupt.
